Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Angelique
Reviews.Content: The color was gray, and I asked for a black camera... But everything else was fine, and he gave me a nice bag for it :)

ProductInfo.Features:
Same as Canon EOS Rebel XTi / 400D * 10.1-megapixel CMOS sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints.
New self-cleaning dust function, plus Dust Delete Data Detection in included software
Large 2.5-inch LCD display; includes Canon's EF-S 18-55mm, f3.5-5.6 zoom lens
DIGIC II Image Processor provides fast, accurate image processing; Picture Style settings for added creative control
Stores images on Compact Flash (CF) memory cards; powered by battery pack NB-2LH
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Kiss X (Rebel XTi / Eos-400D) 10 MP CMOS APS-C Digital SLR Camera with 2.5 inch LCD + EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 Lens
